amendment.description: Amendment required that reports of condition filed by an insured depository institution which received an investment or other assistance under TARP shall, to the extent possible, report the amount of any increase and decrease in new lending attributable to the TARP investment or assistance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 110-922 to require that any lending assistance provided under TARP or EISA to an insured depository institution shall report the amount of any increase and decrease in new lending attributed to the TARP and EISA assistance.
